p: The present study was carried out based on a search of the literature of natural antioxidants and coronavirus. The search, performed in the PubMed database, included studies published until March 2020 and used the following keywords: coronavirus, antioxidants, flavonoids, oxidative stress, MERS-CoV; SARS-CoV, 229E, NL63, OC43, HKU1, MERS-CoV virus infection; and Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Virus. The scientific publications were selected from studies published in the English language.
